meanings.definition: Blood vessels that carry blood towards the heart.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how the veins help blood flow back to the heart.
meanings.sent2: You can see the veins on the back of your hand.
meanings.sent3: The veins in the leaves of the plant looked like tiny rivers on a map.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness ran through her veins, warming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The spider web of veins in the leaf was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A streak or marking on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The marble countertop had elegant veins running through it.
meanings.sent2: The veins in the marble added character to the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The veins in the wood grain resembled lightning bolts striking the surface.
meanings.sent4: The veins of color in the painting created a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The veins in the marble slab looked like nature's artwork.

meanings.definition: A mineral deposit within a rock.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found veins of gold embedded in the rock.
meanings.sent2: The veins of silver in the ore were valuable.
meanings.sent3: The veins of quartz sparkled like hidden treasures in the stone.
meanings.sent4: The veins of copper gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The veins of precious minerals were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
